titleStmt.title: The apology of Theophilus Higgons lately minister, now Catholique VVherein the letter of Sir Edvv. Hoby Knight, directed vnto the sayd T.H. in answere of his first motiue, is modestly examined, and clearely refuted.
titleStmt.author: Higgons, Theophilus, 1578?-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Machvel, dwelling in the streete of the prison, ouer against the Crowne of Orlea[n]s,

notesStmt.note: Errata sheet on the verso of page 55 bears the statement: Errours passed in some copies.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the streete of the prison, ouer against the Crowne of Orlea[n]s
